text:
@AshleyRParker @PhilipRucker Does Covid-19 testing work or NOT, or do I have to get tested everyday like the National Security Advisor or anyone in the White House with FULL TAXPAYER FUNDED MEDICAL COVERAGE?
I've not been tested yet, but remain healthy.  Probably because I maintain distance from Republicans.
